channel.title: Version 2.1 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 2.1.0 (2021-09-07) Cap'n Hugo 0.69.0 0.69.0 This release requires a newer Cap'n Hugo version. Change Change In case th' siteâ€™s structure contains additional *.md files not part o' th' ship (eg files that be meant t' be included by ship planks - see CHANGELOG.md 'n th' exampleSite), they will now be ignored by th' search. New New Hidden planks be indexed fer th' ship search by default. Ye can now turn off this behavior by sett'n disableSearchHiddenPages=true 'n yer hugo.toml.
